description:
La Hulpe Christmas market
One of the coziest Christmas markets in Belgium is waiting for us! From 7 to 9 December for food drinks and ice skating!
I’ll be there waiting for you in my Greek products “salle” to offer you ouzo and amazing quality olive oil as well as small delicacies and gift baskets. These days will be dedicated to stylish presents and having fun!
P.S You will find me there throughout all 3 days, although every one of us will arrive individually, so the time of arrival may differ for any of you.
Hope to see you all there
Dionysia
name: Let's go to La Hulpe Christmas market

group.name: Fashion and Beauty Network in Belgium

name: Join me at the first shopping trip of 2013

group.name: Fashion and Beauty Network in Belgium

description:
Dear style lovers,

You are probably preparing for the Christmas period and the New Year’s Eve or you may already packing your luggage for your winter holidays, but time is flying fast and winter SALES are on the spot! I'm already filling up the available spaces for the first guided shopping trips of Brussels this January but there are only three spaces per shopping trip!

I invite you to get the New Year started off in style by joining me at Woluwe shopping center Saturday, January 12^th[masked]:00 am to 16:30 pm

As February is generally not a very good month for shopping, I won't be hosting guided shopping trips until March so it's your only chance to shop with me before Spring.

That’s the best period for buys, once sales will be available so it will be a great opportunity to buy a few high quality - law priced items!
I will be offering my shopping services with a 50% discount so you can participate in that amazing shopping trip with only 30€ / person instead of 60€ including a FREE ½ hour pre-consultation!

With my shopping guidance you will not spent any more money to buy clothes that are still hanged in your wardrobe with their price tags on! I will analyze your personal needs and I will only lead you to buy the best and more usable pieces in clothing and / or accessories!
So do not forget to book your place now, once I will pass my knowledge and tips to only 3 persons per trip!

BOOK YOUR PLACE HERE (mailto:[masked])

But just before explaining how does “Shopping Made Fun” work, read the tip of the month bellow


**
Tip of the month
------------------------------------------------------------
Brows the frame of your eyes!
The best brows have a slight arch. To find yours, take a long brush or pencil and hold it parallel to the outside edge of the colored part of your eye (the iris). Where the brush meets the brow is where the highest part of your brow should be. Finally tweeze the hairs underneath the arch.

Don't forget to like Style me Fab.net on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/Stylemefab.net)

How does «Shopping Made Fun» work?
* Each shopping trip is open to 3 women only so you get plenty of my personal attention and shop with women who are feeling the same like you.
* This season only two shopping trips will be available (be sure to register right away. Shopping trips trip usually sell out quickly).
* Each shopping trip will include 2-1/2 hours of shopping.
* Exclusive Invitation: This program is only open to women who have been through a personal image consultation with me or attended one of my seminars or workshops.
* You can invite any of your friends or family to join you in that trip so you can make this shopping experience really personal. They can also have the 50% discount in my services and enjoy the unique advantages that only you can offer!

Woluwe Shopping Center details:
* A guided shopping trip with only 3 women is a perfect solution to jumpstart your wardrobe, honor your budget, and keep your personal style front and center!
* Think "What Not To Wear" meets "Fashion stylist"!
* Shopping Made Fun / A Group Shopping Experience With Dionysia
* Woluwe Shopping Center (Woluwe Brussels)

Saturday, January 12th,[masked]:00-16:30
* It's that easy to get your wardrobe and personal style feeling great.

Send an e-mail to book your place now (mailto:[masked])

(Please write in the theme section Woluwe shopping center Guided Shopping trip)

I am looking forward to helping you add fabulous touches to your wardrobe and personal style!

P.S. Have questions? Let me know right away, and I will be happy to help you decide if this is the perfect next step for you. Remember, this is on first come, first served basis so grab your spot now!

P.P.S it’s still December so don’t forget to check my WEBSITE (http://www.stylemefab.net) and choose any of my services with a 20€ discount (valid up to the end of the month).

With love and style
Dionysia
Style me Fab.net (http://www.stylemefab.net)
dleolei@gmail.com (mailto:[masked])
name: Guided Group Shopping Trips at Woluwe shopping center

description:
1er Atelier Style et Relooking (Bilingual) / English - French

Forme de poire ou de pomme ? Triangle ou Sablier ? Connaissant le type de votre corps est la première étape pour la recherche fabuleuse! Image experte Dionysia Leolei, a lancé une nouvelle série de Body Shape – Style et de Beauté ateliers où vous pourrez découvrir comment s'habiller pour votre forme de corps- comment créer l'illusion de la figure parfaite - partager avec vous différents styles et secrets de beauté dont tout le monde rêve !

2 mars thème : Découvrir votre type morphologique « Mesurer et apprendre votre corps »

- Les types de morphologie et ce qui nous rend une poire ou une pomme

- Comment la façon dont nous nous habillons peut affecter nos vies

- Qu'est-ce que l'illusion d'image

- Apprenez les “tricks” qui utilisent les plus célèbres stylistes du monde

Je vais attendre pour vous….

Réservez pour deux et demandez votre réduction

Non membres / guests : 16€

Avec amour et style

Dionysia

Image Expert

group.name: Fashion and Beauty Network in Belgium

description:
Dear All,

I have one spot available for a color analysis session with Dionysia.
If you are interested in joining us, please send me an email at [masked]

Please only confirm if you have sure you will attend. Thanks.

More details hereunder:

What : Color analysis session
Date : 18 May 15:00
Location : to be confirmed (Brussels)
Duration : 2-3 hours
Price : 60 eur per person + optional : 25 eur per person for the color wallet
Size of group : 3 attendees

What happens during a color analysis?
•The fashion stylist will test a lot of different colors on you to finally select only the best for you. A customized color analysis is the only way to find your right colors.
• You learn how to determine if a color is in harmony with your color fan, and you will be able to go to a store and eliminate 75% of the items that are not the right color for you.
•For women, the consultation includes a special makeup color recommendation.
•Hair color recommendations are given for color treated hair. This includes all-over color and/or highlights/lowlights.
•Color recommendations are given for all accessories including shoes, purses, jewelry, and eyewear.
•Recommendations are made for your best dark neutrals and light neutrals.
•A personalized fan of color swatches that you can take with you when shopping for clothing, accessories, or cosmetics can be purchased for an extra cost of 25€
name: Color Analysis session with Dionysia

description:
A shopping day at Woluwe Shopping Center is organized for you this Christmas! What better way to enjoy some special girly time together, than hitting the shops with your very own Fashion Expert to guide you?

We'll start the day relaxing over tea or coffee where we'll discuss personality and
shopping tastes so that I can help make those all-important decisions

We'll review the latest trends and accessories and talk about your preferences

This shopping experience will be unique just before Christmas and it’s only limited to 4 people

As an expert Personal Shopper, I'll guide you round the best shops and pick out the perfect styles to complement your personalities, budgets and lifestyles. 

This is a “women only” event!

There is no budget limitation the day is dedicated to be an educational trip and not only a
spend day

This shopping experience is available at 60€ / p.p

PS - In order to avoid disappointment and to guarantee your place will need to pay in
advance by PayPal sending your payment to [masked]

PPS - Want to know more about me and Style me Fab visit my “Style me Fab” website
www.stylemefab.net or my “Corporate & Personal Branding” website
www.dionysialeolei.com
name: Christmas Group Shopping at Woluwe shopping center
